title: That Fucker
description: Heather is in love with her man and does everything for him. She has another guy in her office sniffing around her. Her boyfriend treats her so badly that she is considering giving this new man a shot. Her boyfriend surprises her at the office with a present. Will this be everything that she wanted from him or will it drive her into the new man's arms? How Heather deals with being in love with someone taking advantage of her will make you root for her to find love despite the messed up situation she finds herself in.
author: Emme Hor
